Class AApplication

java.lang.Object
model.abstracts.AApplication
Direct Known Subclasses:
Application
public abstract class AApplication extends Object
Abstract class representing a BTO application in the system. Contains common attributes and methods for all types of applications.

  • Method Details

    • approve

      public boolean approve()
      Approves the application, changing its status to SUCCESSFUL.
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully approved, false otherwise

    • reject

      public boolean reject()
      Rejects the application, changing its status to UNSUCCESSFUL.
      Returns:
      true if the application was successfully rejected, false otherwise

    • bookFlat

      public boolean bookFlat()
      Books a flat for the application, changing its status to BOOKED.
      Returns:
      true if the flat was successfully booked, false otherwise

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal()
      Requests a withdrawal of the application.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successfully requested, false otherwise

    • approveWithdrawal

      public boolean approveWithdrawal()
      Approves a withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successfully approved, false otherwise

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public boolean rejectWithdrawal()
      Rejects a withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal was successfully rejected, false otherwise
